Kebedech Tekleab (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye Etiopia na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe, na onye na-ede uri.
Tekleab gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Fine Arts na Addis Ababa, ebe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ ike na mmegide ụmụ akwụkwọ n'oge mgbanwe ahụ na ngwụcha afọ 1970
N'ịgbapụ Ethiopia, ọ banyere n'agha mba ahụ na Somalia, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ogige ọrụ mmanye ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri
A tọhapụrụ ya n'afọ 1989 o wee kwaga isonyere ezinụlọ ya na United States, ebe ọ natara nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts n'afọ 1992 na Master of Fine Arts n'afọ 1995 na Mahadum Howard
O mepụtara usoro ọrụ ntaramahụhụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ edemede ya "Humanity In Descent: Visual Images Of Human Suffering".
Tekleab akụziela na SCAD Savannah College of Art and Design na Savannah, Georgia, na Mahadum Howard, na Washington, DC
Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a na The City University of New York, na New York City.
N'afọ 2001, Tekleab na Alexander Boghossian rụkọrọ ọrụ na kọmitii a na-akpọ Nexus for the Wall of Representation na Embassy of Ethiopia na Washington, D.C

Ọrụ ahụ bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ aluminum (365 x 1585 cm) nke a na-etinye na mgbidi granite nke ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya ahụ. Nexus gụnyere ihe ịchọ mma, ụkpụrụ na akara sitere na ọdịnala okpukpe ndị Etiopia nke gụnyere Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, okpukpe ndị Juu, Alakụba na omume ime mmụọ ndị ọzọ nke ụmụ amaala na-agụnye akwụkwọ mpịakọta ihe atụ na ụdị ndị na-anọchite anya ngwá egwu, ngwá ọrụ bara uru, na osisi na anụmanụ mpaghara.
